line_1: "Numbs my cold limbs, and hardens into salt! —
line_2: "I freeze! I freeze! just Heaven regards my fault,

line_1: Why PETER's a Critic, with true Attic Salt,
line_2: Can damn the Performers, can hiss, and find fault,

line_1: And left the pepper-box and salt
line_2: The liquorish youth had made an halt;
